title: Romantic Escape in Tasmania’s Northwest Coast
description: Soak up the natural beauty of Tasmania with a stay at the Stanley Seaview Inn, a peaceful retreat nestled in the historical fishing village of Stanley, on the north-west coast of the island. Offering picturesque views over the Bass Strait and the iconic Stanley Nut, this is the perfect place to stop on your road-trip adventure through Tasmania’s wilderness. Includes a daily light breakfast basket and a bottle of wine on arrival.
